'use client'; import React from 'react'; import { EnvelopeIcon, PhoneIcon, MapPinIcon, LinkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import '../styles/footer.css'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); return (

); }; export default Footer;
